title: Radicalized Westerners May Face Prison If They Go Home
teaser: More than 500 British Muslims have traveled to Syria to fight in its civil war over the past three years. Now some of them have become disillusioned and want to return home â€” but a long prison term may be waiting for them. Robert Siegel talks to Peter Neumann, Director of the International Centre for the Study of Radicalisation.
